title: Definitions
context: §180-1 Definitions. Whenever used in this chapter: &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means a member of the governing body of a district. &ldquo;District&rdquo; or &ldquo;soil and water conservation district&rdquo; means a governmental subdivision of this State, and a public body corporate and politic, organized in accordance with this chapter. &ldquo;Due notice&rdquo; means notice given during a ten-day period by publication or if no means of publication is available by posting at a reasonable number of conspicuous places within the affected area. &ldquo;Land occupier&rdquo; or &ldquo;occupier of land&rdquo; includes any person, firm, or corporation who leases or holds title to lands for agricultural designation or use within a district organized, or to be organized, under this chapter. [L 1947, c 191, §3; RL 1955, §28-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §38; am L 1961, c 53, §1; HRS §180-1; am L 1991, c 94, §2]
